docs.lead_paragraph: Almost despite himself, Dr. Richard I. Feinbloom, who heads the family and child health division of the Boston Children's Medical Center, has put together an important book for those parents he describes as "welloff and well-educated."

headline.main: PARENT/CHILD; Two Reference Books With a Personal Touch
